These sources collectively confirm the primary headquarters location on the U.S. East Coast, specifically New York, NY, US.

companies.name: AQR Capital Management
companies.description: AQR Capital Management is an American investment management firm that offers hedge fund and other alternative investment strategies, headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut on the U.S. East Coast.

citations.title: Our Firm - AQR Capital Management
excerpts: AQR moves its headquarters to Greenwich, Connecticut.

basis.reasoning: The citations from the company website and Wikipedia both state that AQR Capital Management’s headquarters are in Greenwich, Connecticut, United States. Connecticut is an East‑Coast state, so the entity matches the East‑Coast location requirement.

The Wikipedia excerpt lists the industry as “Hedge fund” and notes that AQR offers alternative investment strategies, while the company site describes it as an investment management firm that provides hedge‑fund and alternative strategies. These keywords satisfy the hedge‑fund type criteria.
